Package org.osgi.service.indexer

Interface Summary
Resource A resource that is to be indexed.
ResourceAnalyzer A resource analyzer is responsible for analyzing a resource for some specific purpose, and discovering requirements and capabilities that may not be discovered by the basic Bundle Analyzer.
ResourceIndexer ResourceIndexer is an OSGi service that creates a Repository XML representation by indexing resource capabilities and requirements.
 

Class Summary
Builder A container for attributes and directives under a certain namespace.
Capability A capability
Namespaces Predefined namespaces
Requirement A requirement
